Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1999, hitting .364 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 6/12/1999 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/1999 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/1/2000 to a 4-year deal worth $3,333,330 per year...
Released by St. Louis on 2/25/2000...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/27/2000 to a 2-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Traded from New York (A) to Boston on 7/1/2000 (Going to BOS: RF T. Hollandsworth. Going to NYY: P J. Pearce)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 9/12/2000...
Traded from Boston to Pittsburgh on 2/25/2001 (Going to PIT: RF T. Hollandsworth. Going to BOS: 1B C. Rivera)...
Was selected to the 2001 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Atlanta on 7/31/2001 (Going to PIT: CF S. Finley, P M. Gallo. Going to ATL: RF T. Hollandsworth)...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 9/12/2002...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/2002, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 18 RBI...
Won World Series with Atlanta in 2002...
Injured on 6/27/2003 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/28/2005 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/27/2008 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/26/2009 to a 2-year deal worth $630,000 per year...
Drafted in 6th round, 168th overall pick, by Florida in 2011...
Released by Florida on 11/5/2011...
Drafted in 2nd round, 51st overall pick, by St. Louis in 2014...
Injured on 7/18/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/26/2016 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...

Injured on 4/1/1977 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
